tasks.prompt_description: Write a program that handles user input and performs some operations, ensuring that all errors are properly caught and handled.

hints.java: Use try-catch blocks to handle exceptions gracefully.
hints.c: Check return values of functions and handle errors appropriately.
hints.cpp: Use try-catch blocks and handle exceptions properly.
hints.python: Use try-except blocks to catch and handle exceptions.

tasks.comments: Proper error handling prevents information leakage and ensures the program can handle unexpected situations without crashing.
